title: How much less oxygen do humans consume while they sleep? - Quora

response.answer_text: There would be a variation on % as people are different to the volume of air they intake but with no exersion, excersizing there for not requiring extra oxygen your would breath shallower in your sleep but during a nightmere or excessive movment you might breath slightly more but i would say as a rule you would inhale use far less ozygen at night sleeping
